title: Cashback on debit cards, permissible? - assim al hakeem
transcript: I have a debit card and I know debit cards are Halal but then it has cashback offers so is it okay to keep this debit card while avoiding this cash back with us yes you can use your debit card without any problem and if they offer you cash back uh then you have to take it and dispose of it in means of Charity because this is a form of ribba that they are giving to you
